Package edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blackjack
    Blackjack Class has the following: Deck, ArrayList (list for players), Player (dealer), and Card (next card to show).
    BlackjackGui
    BlackjackGui Class contains all widgets for Blackjack game interface.
    BlackjackTest
    test class for Blackjack
    Card
    Card Class has the following variables: suit, value, name, isAce (check if Ace), and cardNumber (set to face if > 10)
    CardTest
    test class for Card
    Deck
    class Deck contains an ArrayList of Cards
    DeckTest
    test class for Deck
    Hand
    Class Hand contains an ArrayList of Cards and an int representing the value of the hand
    HandTest
    test class for Hand
    Player
    Player Class has the following: Hand, String name, and a boolean for busting.
    PlayerTest
    test class for Player
